targets.rawSql:
WITH v1 AS (
  SELECT
    repository,
    payload -> 'workflow_run' ->> 'name' AS name,
    payload ->> 'action' AS action,
    payload -> 'workflow_run' ->> 'html_url' AS url,
    (payload -> 'workflow_run' ->> 'updated_at')::timestamp AS updated_at,
    (payload -> 'workflow_run' ->> 'run_started_at')::timestamp AS started_at,
    payload -> 'workflow_run' ->> 'conclusion' AS conclusion,
    payload -> 'workflow_run' ->> 'run_attempt' AS attempt
  FROM github_events
  WHERE
    event = 'workflow_run' AND
    organization = '$org' AND
    repository IN ($repo) AND
    receipt BETWEEN to_timestamp($__from / 1000) AND to_timestamp($__to / 1000) AND
    payload -> 'workflow_run' ->> 'head_branch' ~ '$branch' AND 
    payload -> 'workflow_run' ->> 'name' IN ($workflow)
), v2 AS (
  SELECT * 
  FROM v1 
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 
    repository,
    name,
    'requested' AS action,
    url,
    started_at AS updated_at,
    started_at,
    '' AS conclusion,
    attempt
  FROM v1
  WHERE
    action = 'completed' AND
    attempt <> '1'
), v3 AS (
  SELECT *,
    CASE WHEN action = 'requested' THEN NOW() ELSE updated_at END AS completed_at,
    CASE WHEN action = 'requested' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_requested,
    CASE WHEN action = 'completed' AND conclusion = 'success' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_success,
    CASE WHEN action = 'completed' AND conclusion = 'failure' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_failure,
    CASE WHEN action = 'completed' AND conclusion = 'skipped' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_skipped,
    CASE WHEN action = 'completed' AND conclusion = 'cancelled' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_cancelled
  FROM v2
), v4 AS (
  SELECT *,
    CASE WHEN array_length(ARRAY[$repo], 1) = 1 THEN name ELSE repository END AS id,
    EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM completed_at - started_at) / 60.0 AS duration,
    date_trunc('$bucket', updated_at) AS time_bucket,
    SUM(is_requested) OVER (ORDER BY updated_at) AS requested,
    SUM(is_success) OVER (ORDER BY updated_at) AS success,
    SUM(is_failure) OVER (ORDER BY updated_at) AS failure,
    SUM(is_skipped) OVER (ORDER BY updated_at) AS skipped,
    SUM(is_cancelled) OVER (ORDER BY updated_at) AS cancelled
  FROM v3
)
SELECT
  repository,
  name,
  action,
  url,
  conclusion,
  attempt,
  updated_at,
  id,
  duration,
  time_bucket,
  -- is_requested,
  is_success,
  -- is_failure,
  -- is_skipped,
  -- is_cancelled,
  requested,
  success,
  failure,
  skipped,
  cancelled
FROM v4
ORDER BY updated_at

WITH v1 AS (
  SELECT
    repository,
    payload -> 'workflow_job' ->> 'workflow_name' AS workflow_name,
    payload -> 'workflow_job' ->> 'name' AS name,
    payload ->> 'action' AS action,
    payload -> 'workflow_job' ->> 'html_url' AS url,
    (payload -> 'workflow_job' ->> 'created_at')::timestamp AS _created_at,
    (payload -> 'workflow_job' ->> 'started_at')::timestamp AS _started_at,
    (payload -> 'workflow_job' ->> 'completed_at')::timestamp AS _completed_at,
    payload -> 'workflow_job' ->> 'conclusion' AS conclusion,
    payload -> 'workflow_job' ->> 'runner_name' AS runner
  FROM github_events
  WHERE
    event = 'workflow_job' AND
    organization = '$org' AND
    repository IN ($repo) AND
    receipt BETWEEN to_timestamp($__from / 1000) AND to_timestamp($__to / 1000) AND
    payload -> 'workflow_job' ->> 'head_branch' ~ '$branch' AND
    payload -> 'workflow_job' ->> 'labels' ~ '$runner' AND 
    payload -> 'workflow_job' ->> 'labels' IN ($label) AND
    payload -> 'workflow_job' ->> 'workflow_name' IN ($workflow) AND
    payload -> 'workflow_job' ->> 'name' IN ($job)
), v2 AS (
  SELECT *,
    COALESCE(_completed_at, NOW()) AS completed_at,
    COALESCE(_started_at, NOW()) AS started_at,
    COALESCE(_created_at, NOW()) AS created_at,
    COALESCE(_completed_at, _started_at, _created_at) AS updated_at,
    CASE WHEN action = 'queued' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_queued,
    CASE WHEN action = 'in_progress' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_in_progress,
    CASE WHEN action = 'completed' AND conclusion = 'success' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_success,
    CASE WHEN action = 'completed' AND conclusion = 'failure' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_failure,
    CASE WHEN action = 'completed' AND conclusion = 'cancelled' AND runner <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_cancelled_in_progress,
    CASE WHEN action = 'completed' AND conclusion = 'cancelled' AND runner = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_cancelled
  FROM v1
), v3 AS (
  SELECT *,
    CASE WHEN array_length(ARRAY[$repo], 1) = 1 THEN workflow_name || ' / ' || name ELSE repository END AS id,
    EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM completed_at - started_at) / 60.0 AS execution,
    EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM completed_at - created_at) / 60.0 AS duration,
    EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM started_at - created_at) / 60.0 AS wait,
    date_trunc('$bucket', updated_at) AS time_bucket,
    SUM(is_queued) OVER (ORDER BY updated_at) AS queued,
    SUM(is_in_progress) OVER (ORDER BY updated_at) AS in_progress,
    SUM(is_success) OVER (ORDER BY updated_at) AS success,
    SUM(is_failure) OVER (ORDER BY updated_at) AS failure,
    SUM(is_cancelled) OVER (ORDER BY updated_at) AS cancelled,
    SUM(is_cancelled_in_progress) OVER (ORDER BY updated_at) AS cancelled_in_progress
  FROM v2
)
SELECT
  repository,
  workflow_name,
  name,
  action,
  url,
  conclusion,
  updated_at,
  id,
  execution,
  duration,
  wait,
  time_bucket,
  -- is_queued,
  -- is_in_progress,
  is_success,
  -- is_failure,
  -- is_cancelled,
  -- is_cancelled_in_progress,
  queued,
  in_progress,
  success,
  failure,
  cancelled,
  cancelled_in_progress
FROM v3
ORDER BY updated_at

panels.title: Job Execution Time

panels.description: GitHub doesn't issue completed event for invalid workflow configs which might lead to some workflow runs showing as in progress forever.
panels.title: Number of Workflows

panels.description: We might go into negative numbers if the time range doesn't cover the initial queued/in_progress events, or if GitHub doesn't send us in_progress event for a cancelled job that has been assigned a runner.
panels.title: Number of Jobs

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT payload -> 'workflow_job' ->> 'labels' FROM github_events WHERE event = 'workflow_job' AND organization = '$org' AND repository in ($repo) AND payload -> 'workflow_job' ->> 'workflow_name' in ($workflow) AND payload -> 'workflow_job' ->> 'name' in ($job)
